name: WP Stack
tagline: A toolkit for creating professional WordPress deployments
body:
### Professional WordPress Deployments

Run WordPress like a pro:

* Site code in a Git repository (hint: start with [WordPress Skeleton](https://github.com/markjaquith/WordPress-Skeleton))
* Test in a staging environment (with separate DB and files)
* Deploy with Capistrano

### Useful Drop-ins

* CDN rewriter
* Multisite uploads rewriter (for direct serving of uploads)
* More to come!

### Future

* Puppet manifest
* Vagrant support
